verbs.description: as [ARG1: hershee bar] [V: closes] [ARGM-PRP: for good supporters share stories of the past 35 years] many citizens are outraged and upset because they said when the world has been cruel hershee bar has been a place of comfort and acceptance bar 35 years hershee bar
